Package nl.fw.yapool.socket

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SocketAcceptor
    A ServerSocket-thread that accepts incoming sockets and starts connection-tasks for them.
    SocketTask
    Socket task that just logs an info- or warn-statement.
    SocketUsageLogger
    Reports the acitivity of a SocketAcceptor as a log-statement that looks like:
    SleepManyReporter - accepted: 22, processing: 5, processed: 15, workers: 5
    Usage is only reported when values have changed (i.e.
    SocketUtil
